statements: DELETE FROM door_window_status WHERE sensor_id = 5 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM motion_detection WHERE sensor_id = 1 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00'

DELETE FROM MotionDetection WHERE id = 1 AND device_id = 101;
DELETE FROM DoorStatus WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND door_status = 'closed';

DELETE FROM motion_detection WHERE sensor_id = 123 AND timestamp = '2022-01-01 12:00:00'
